cultevo
  • Reference

Calculate exact significance levels of the Page L statistic.

Returns the null probability that the Page statistic with the given k, N is >= L.

page.compute.exact(k, N, L)

Arguments

k

number of conditions/generations
N

number of replications/chains
L

value of the Page L statistic

Value

the significance level of L for the given k, N

See also

page.test

Examples

page.compute.exact(6, 4, 322)
#> [1] 0.03932265

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • See also
  • Examples
